title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 520.2 - Legal base
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 520.2 - Legal base

State Regulations
(a) Section
7.09
of the

Mental Hygiene Law grants the Commissioner of Mental Health the power and
responsibility to adopt regulations that are necessary and proper to implement
matters under his or her jurisdiction. (b) Article 6-A of the Public Officers Law
sets forth agency obligations for maintaining, disclosing, granting access to
and retention of records containing personal information about individuals, and
requires the Office of Mental Health to establish rules and regulations
necessary to comply with the article. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
520.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
